event_name: ¡Báilalo! A festive night of Latin-American rhythms, voices & dance!
location: St. Mark's Lutheran Church, 1573 East 18th Avenue, Vancouver, BC V5N 2H4
description: Celebrate 10 years of Viene Sonando & support St. Mark's refugee project. A multidisciplinary celebration showcasing talented local Latin-American artists performing tango, danzón, merengue, and more.
